entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# compiler integration with new System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExtendedLayoutAttribute #74705
  • Decompiled sources resolve wrong type. #74704
  • Refactor "Move type to file" should re-evaluate file header template #74703
  • Fix formatting not using tabs #74702
  • Visual Studio did not auto fill complete after typing Property in VB.net #74701
  • CA1003 does not take the return value of an event handler into account #74694
  • Default literals should not contribute their type from initial binding to best-type in nullable analysis #74693

Closed

  • The [InterceptsLocation] attribute generates a different "data" string for big-endian platforms #74682
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35208.78 #74692

PullRequests

Created

  • Modify ISyntaxTreeFactoryService.CreateSyntaxTree to take in an optional SourceText. #74707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle partial properties in struct field ordering warning #74706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Trying out a nightly build #74699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Modify MergedNamespaceDeclaration.MakeChildren to to allocate less #74698
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CODE_STYLE workarounds #74697
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement support for triggering Fix All from additional files #74695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Issue71522 wip #74691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix issues with VSCode LSP EA causing handlers to fail to load #74700
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rewrite BulidSolution in Integration tests #74690
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure that GetContentHash produces the same value on different endian machines #74696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove most usage of "new ArrayBuilder" #74689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
